website_summaries.verdict: A simple double hanging terrarium that adds character to any space.
pros: This elegant metal-frame terrarium holds two included glass globes and is fairly sturdy
The glass is thin but clear
A few small plants can fit in each globe
The globes are 4 3/4" in diameter, and the stand is 13" tall
cons: The globes are incredibly fragile, and some customers received their sets without the globes

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the Glass
customer_reviews.text: This terrarium is a nice size, unfortunately the glass is very fragile. Be careful setting up. I wasn't delicate like I should have been and after only putting in the pebble layer the glass cracked and has scratches. This was my error but seeing as other people mentioned the glass's breakability it may also be a thickness issue as well.
customer_reviews.author: AMH

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful when setting it up and where you place it.
customer_reviews.text: The whole look is terrific ut the glass was so thin it broke into small shards. Very disappointed that the quality of the glass wasn't thicker as in other products sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MiaDoe

customer_reviews.title: Immediately broke this trying to open, tears were shed
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was very excited for these but when I went to get the globe out of the Styrofoam packaging it shattered. It looked great before it was in pieces. So others be warned! Dont make the same mistake and handle with great care when opening!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shea Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the base and terrarium!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the base and terrarium! Created a little fairy forest as a gift. They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with inside decorations. Isn’t packaged in display form for gifting.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with sand. Also it doesn’t look very gift ready the way it’s packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepwalker504

customer_reviews.title: Mkono Clear Glass Vase Hanging Plant Terranium
customer_reviews.text: Love this little item. It is sitting in the center of my kitchen table. Also purchased one for my son which he loves as well.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly scratched
customer_reviews.text: The glass was a bit scratched upon arrival, but otherwise excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display air plants. Got some colored moss and it’s a lovely decoration and conversation piece. Would make great gifts!

customer_reviews.title: Got what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, and they're exactly as described. They're being used for air plants.

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I expected, but good quality, I just didn't look at the dimensions beforehand. Would be super cute with a little succulent inside or an electric tea-light.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described including dimensions. Copied a decor ensemble from Pinterest. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item, perfectly packaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful item, perfectly packaged. It's a shame I didn't read that it comes empty... The decoration have to be made by you.

customer_reviews.title: This stand is very different from most of the ones that I have  and it is quite a cute style !
customer_reviews.text: Yes,I now have a collection of air plants and like to have a variety of stands .

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It was super cute from the pictures but it came in way smaller than I anticipated. It’s definitely not a terrarium for lifelong succulents. Maybe a fake one would look nice!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Love it. I wish I would have seen the double before I purchased this one. I would have bought it instead. Super cute

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Will buy again when I expand my air plant collection
